short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds the user about a task every few seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RemindMe: Stay on track with your tasks, no matter where you are on your computer! With RemindMe, setting up quick reminders is a breeze. Simply input your task, specify the time in seconds, and receive timely notifications directly in your computer's notification bar. Whether you're preparing for a meeting, setting a reminder to take a short break, or keeping track of daily to-dos, RemindMe has got your back. Dive into a more organized and punctual digital life with our easy-to-use reminder system!
